summary: WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED ON A SLIGHT INCLINE IT HAD A TENDENCY TO ROLL BACKWARD OR FORWARD.  WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS MAKING A LEFT TURN A LOUD POP WAS HEARD.  VEHICLE STALLED, AND WAS UNABLE TO MOVE IN EITHER DIRECTION.  THEN, VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO A DEALER, WHO INFORMED THE CONSUMER THAT A NEW TRANSMISSION WAS NEEDED.   *AK   HONDA REPORTED NO PARTS OR TRANSMISSIONS.  (HYBRID TRANSMISSION)   *SC
